workExperience.description: Lead developer responsible for spearheading digital transformations for clients like Horizon Pharma and Amgen. Managed cross-functional teams, introduced automated workflows, and integrated advanced AI technologies, achieving significant performance and process improvements

Senior developer focusing on high-performance JavaScript solutions, including Cloudflare Workers and payment libraries. Led design system overhauls and contributed to the creation of a platform-agnostic payment form library.
Web developer and chief editor managing web development projects and content teams. Developed website themes and interactive demos, while overseeing content creation for tech blogs.
Applications developer responsible for supporting legacy ERP billing systems and implementing secure coding practices for financial services. Played a key role in report automation for BNY Mellon.
